001package com.technototes.path.util;
002
003import java.util.HashMap;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.system.Misc;
007
008import com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx.LynxModule;
009import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareMap;
010
011/**
012 * Collection of utilites for interacting with Lynx modules.
013 */
014public class LynxModuleUtil {
015
016    private static final LynxFirmwareVersion MIN_VERSION = new LynxFirmwareVersion(1, 8, 2);
017
018    /**
019     * Parsed representation of a Lynx module firmware version.
020     */
021    public static class LynxFirmwareVersion implements Comparable<LynxFirmwareVersion> {
022        public final int major;
023        public final int minor;
024        public final int eng;
025
026        public LynxFirmwareVersion(int major, int minor, int eng) {
027            this.major = major;
028            this.minor = minor;
029            this.eng = eng;
030        }
031
032        @Override
033        public boolean equals(Object other) {
034            if (other instanceof LynxFirmwareVersion) {
035                LynxFirmwareVersion otherVersion = (LynxFirmwareVersion) other;
036                return major == otherVersion.major && minor == otherVersion.minor && eng == otherVersion.eng;
037            } else {
038                return false;
039            }
040        }
041
042        @Override
043        public int compareTo(LynxFirmwareVersion other) {
044            int majorComp = Integer.compare(major, other.major);
045            if (majorComp == 0) {
046                int minorComp = Integer.compare(minor, other.minor);
047                if (minorComp == 0) {
048                    return Integer.compare(eng, other.eng);
049                } else {
050                    return minorComp;
051                }
052            } else {
053                return majorComp;
054            }
055        }
056
057        @Override
058        public String toString() {
059            return Misc.formatInvariant("%d.%d.%d", major, minor, eng);
060        }
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * Retrieve and parse Lynx module firmware version.
065     * @param module Lynx module
066     * @return parsed firmware version
067     */
068    public static LynxFirmwareVersion getFirmwareVersion(LynxModule module) {
069        String versionString = module.getNullableFirmwareVersionString();
070        if (versionString == null) {
071            return null;
072        }
073
074        String[] parts = versionString.split("[ :,]+");
075        try {
076            // note: for now, we ignore the hardware entry
077            return new LynxFirmwareVersion(
078                    Integer.parseInt(parts[3]), Integer.parseInt(parts[5]), Integer.parseInt(parts[7]));
079        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
080            return null;
081        }
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Exception indicating an outdated Lynx firmware version.
086     */
087    public static class LynxFirmwareVersionException extends RuntimeException {
088        public LynxFirmwareVersionException(String detailMessage) {
089            super(detailMessage);
090        }
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Ensure all of the Lynx modules attached to the robot satisfy the minimum requirement.
095     * @param hardwareMap hardware map containing Lynx modules
096     */
097    public static void ensureMinimumFirmwareVersion(HardwareMap hardwareMap) {
098        Map<String, LynxFirmwareVersion> outdatedModules = new HashMap<>();
099        for (LynxModule module : hardwareMap.getAll(LynxModule.class)) {
100            LynxFirmwareVersion version = getFirmwareVersion(module);
101            if (version == null || version.compareTo(MIN_VERSION) < 0) {
102                for (String name : hardwareMap.getNamesOf(module)) {
103                    outdatedModules.put(name, version);
104                }
105            }
106        }
107        if (outdatedModules.size() > 0) {
108            StringBuilder msgBuilder = new StringBuilder();
109            msgBuilder.append("One or more of the attached Lynx modules has outdated firmware\n");
110            msgBuilder.append(Misc.formatInvariant(
111                    "Mandatory minimum firmware version for Road Runner: %s\n", MIN_VERSION.toString()));
112            for (Map.Entry<String, LynxFirmwareVersion> entry : outdatedModules.entrySet()) {
113                msgBuilder.append(Misc.formatInvariant(
114                        "\t%s: %s\n",
115                        entry.getKey(),
116                        entry.getValue() == null ? "Unknown" : entry.getValue().toString()));
117            }
118            throw new LynxFirmwareVersionException(msgBuilder.toString());
119        }
120    }
121}
